### Subscribe for Seminar and Workshop Notifications

To be notified of upcoming seminars and workshops please subscribe to our mailing list.  Emails will usually be sent out at the beginning of the week and end of the week.

* If you are logged in with G-Mail you can [click here to subscribe](https://mail.google.com/mail/?view=cm&fs=1&to=uhmasw@gmail.com&su=UHMASW Subscription&body=Please add me to the UHM Allied Seminars and Workshop email list for weekly notifications) to have an email automatically generated from your local account.
* Otherwise, please send an email to uhmasw@gmail.com to be added
* To unsubscribe please send an email to uhmasw@gmail.com with request
